bug.author: qo4on
bug.description: Are you going to update your TPU documentation <denchmark-link:https://cloud.google.com/tpu/docs/colabs>https://cloud.google.com/tpu/docs/colabs</denchmark-link> with 2.1 release?

comments.comment:
Sorry, different product. There's a 'Send feedback' button on that page. There's an updated TPU guide on tensorflow.org here: <denchmark-link:https://www.tensorflow.org/guide/tpu>https://www.tensorflow.org/guide/tpu</denchmark-link>
And we're working to update a few of our long-running notebooks.
